TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供若干使用和发布 SOAP 格式的远程对象的方法。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects in SOAP format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类发出链接请求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构权限，则会引发安全异常。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) 。See [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类中的成员在 对象和 XML 类型之间进行转换。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XML type. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#100)]

span.span: The common language runtime type namespace name from the provided namespace and assembly names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前方法由 .NET Framework 和 SoapSuds 工具用来创建公共语言运行时对象类型的 XML 命名空间名称。The current method is used by the .NET Framework and the SoapSuds tool to create an XML namespace name for a common language runtime object type. 有关 SoapSuds 的详细信息，请参阅 [SoapSuds 工具 ( # A0) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))。For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#101)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#101)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 .NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将从流中读取的 XML 转换为公共语言运行时类型。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 用于指定 .NET Framework 应如何生成和分析 XML 流的信息存储在位于命名空间中的自定义特性中 。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 可以通过两种方法在配置文件中指定此信息：显式指定映射，或指定要预加载的对象类型。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 当前方法支持检索此类映射。The current method supports the retrieval of such mappings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#102)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#102)]

exception.span: 参数为 或为空。

span.span: The parameter is or empty.

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

summary.span: 从 XML 特性名、命名空间和包含对象的 中检索字段类型。

span.span: Retrieves field type from XML attribute name, namespace, and the of the containing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果给定的包含对象的类型以及 .NET Framework 中读入的 XML 特性和 XML 命名空间的类型，则当前方法将返回该字段的实际公共语言运行时字段名称和类型。Given the type of the containing object and the XML attribute and XML namespace that is read in by the .NET Framework, the current method returns the actual common language runtime field name and type of the field. 然后，.NET Framework 使用此信息来填充该字段，其中包含从 XML 流中读取的数据。The .NET Framework then uses this information to populate that field with the data read in from the XML stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks SoapSuds 工具使用当前方法来确定 XML 命名空间是表示公共语言运行时类型还是非公共语言运行时系统中的类型。The current method is used by the SoapSuds tool to determine whether an XML namespace represents a common language runtime type or a type from a non-common language runtime system. 有关 SoapSuds 的详细信息，请参阅 [SoapSuds 工具 ( # A0) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))。For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public static void PreLoad (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly);
.method public static hidebysig void PreLoad(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed
Public Shared Sub PreLoad (assembly As Assembly)
public: static void PreLoad(System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly);
static member PreLoad : System.Reflection.Assembly -> unit

param.name: assembly
param.span: 为其每种类型均调用 的 。

summary.span: 根据在与每个类型关联的 中的信息预加载位于指定 中的每个 。

span.span: Preloads every found in the specified from the information found in the associated with each type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 .NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将从流中读取的 XML 转换为公共语言运行时类型。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 用于指定 .NET Framework 应如何生成和分析 XML 流的信息存储在位于命名空间中的自定义特性中 。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 可以通过两种方法在配置文件中指定此信息：显式指定映射，或指定要预加载的对象类型。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 自定义属性是在预加载过程中读取的，它们中的信息可供 SOAP 分析器使用。The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#120)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

param.name: mb

span.span: The of the method to associate with the SOAPAction cached with it.

span.span: Associates the specified with the SOAPAction cached with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定方法的 SOAPAction 包含在 属性中，或已从网络读取。The SOAPAction of the specified method is contained in the property, or is read off the wire. 当前方法将 SOAPAction 与的关联， 以便在信道接收器中使用。The current method associates the SOAPAction with the for use in channel sinks. SOAPAction HTTP 请求标头字段指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意向。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. 该值是一个 URI，用于标识目的。The value is a URI identifying the intent. SOAP 不会限制 URI 的格式或不具体，也不会对其进行解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. 发出 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. SOAP 不会限制 URI 的格式或不具体，也不会对其进行解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. 发出 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议将公共语言运行时类编码为 XML 命名空间。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前属性指定 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 公共语言运行时类的所有 XML 命名空间都以 当前属性返回的开头。All XML namespaces for a common language runtime class start with the that the current property returns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议将公共语言运行时类编码为 XML 命名空间。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前属性指定 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类有一个程序集，但没有命名空间，则当前属性返回使用的默认 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class has an assembly but no namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. member this.XmlNsForClrTypeWithNs : string

summary.span: 获取 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: Gets the XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

value.span: XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: The XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议将公共语言运行时类编码为 XML 命名空间。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前属性指定 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类是 mscorlib 程序集的一部分，则使用当前属性返回的 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class is part of the mscorlib assembly, the XML namespace returned by the current property is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#132](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#132)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#132](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#132)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string XmlNsForClrTypeWithNsAndAssembly { get; }
.property string XmlNsForClrTypeWithNsAndAssembly
Public Shared ReadOnly Property XmlNsForClrTypeWithNsAndAssembly As String
public: static property System::String ^ XmlNsForClrTypeWithNsAndAssembly { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.XmlNsForClrTypeWithNsAndAssembly : string

summary.span: 获取默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: Gets the default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.

value.span: 默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

span.span: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 和 SOAP 协议将公共语言运行时类编码为 XML 命名空间。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 当前属性指定 XML 命名空间的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果公共语言运行时类有一个程序集和一个公共语言运行时命名空间，则当前属性将返回所使用的默认 XML 命名空间。If a common language runtime class has an assembly and a common language runtime namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#133](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#133)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#133](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#133)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
